table.title: WebSMS Gateway Events
table.searchString: sourcetype=2fa:securenvoy | rex field=_raw "^\d+\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\s+\d+:\d+:\d+\s+(?<source_server>(\w|-)+)\s(?<facility>.*)\sUserID=(?<userid>.*)@(?<domain>(\w|\.)+)\s(?<status_msg>.*)" | search facility="WebSMS Gateway" | rex mode=sed field=date_mday "s/(\d+)/0000\1/" | rex mode=sed field=date_mday "s/0*([0-9]{2})/\1/" | rex mode=sed field=date_hour "s/(\d+)/0000\1/" | rex mode=sed field=date_hour "s/0*([0-9]{2})/\1/" | rex mode=sed field=date_minute "s/(\d+)/0000\1/" | rex mode=sed field=date_minute "s/0*([0-9]{2})/\1/" | rex mode=sed field=date_second "s/(\d+)/0000\1/" | rex mode=sed field=date_second "s/0*([0-9]{2})/\1/" | eval userfriendly=date_mday." ".date_month." ".date_hour.":".date_minute.":".date_second." - ".status_msg." for user ".userid."@".domain | table userfriendly | rename userfriendly AS "Results"

table.title: Local Admin Events
table.searchString: sourcetype=2fa:securenvoy | rex field=_raw "^\d+\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\s+\d+:\d+:\d+\s+(?<source_server>(\w|-)+)\s(?<facility>.*)\sUserID=(?<userid>(\w|-)*[^\s])\s(?<status_msg>.*)" | search facility=admin | rex mode=sed field=date_mday "s/(\d+)/0000\1/" | rex mode=sed field=date_mday "s/0*([0-9]{2})/\1/" | rex mode=sed field=date_hour "s/(\d+)/0000\1/" | rex mode=sed field=date_hour "s/0*([0-9]{2})/\1/" | rex mode=sed field=date_minute "s/(\d+)/0000\1/" | rex mode=sed field=date_minute "s/0*([0-9]{2})/\1/" | rex mode=sed field=date_second "s/(\d+)/0000\1/" | rex mode=sed field=date_second "s/0*([0-9]{2})/\1/" | eval userfriendly=date_mday." ".date_month." ".date_hour.":".date_minute.":".date_second." - ".status_msg | table userfriendly | rename userfriendly AS "Results"

".date_month." ".date_hour.":".date_minute.":".date_second." - ".status_msg | table userfriendly | rename userfriendly AS "Results"
